articles.title: Kobo’s Libra Colour and Elipsa 2E e-readers have dropped to some of their best prices
articles.summary: Kobo is discounting two of its best e-readers. articles.title: Tesla says it delivered its first car autonomously from factory to customer
articles.summary: This might be a bigger deal than the robotaxis. Tesla said it completed its first fully autonomous vehicle delivery from factory to customer.
